thread.section_title: Hotel Therese - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel with best location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel with best location - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Yury M
title: Nice hotel with best location
text:
First of all I should say that hotel has the best location. The Louvre is close. The room is a bit smaller than we expected. Also, the capsule coffee machine wasn't found in the room but it was mentioned about it during the booking. The breakfasts were monotonous during our stay within 4 days.
The staff is very welcoming and kind. In general, the hotel is OK.
